org.relationlearn.filters

Interface FilterGroup

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SequentialFilterGroup

    public interface FilterGroup
    The FilterGroup interface defines a container for an undefined amount of TextFilters allowing the generation of weka Instance objects with as many attributes as the number of TextFilter objects present in the group.
    See Also:
    TextFilter, Instance

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClassAttribute(Attribute attr)
      Adds the Attribute that corresponds to the class of this FilterGroup generated Instances
      void addFilter(TextFilter filter)
      Adds a new TextFilter to the FilterGroup.
      Instance createInstanceUsingFilters(String r, String h)
      Generates an Instance object by applying all the TextFilter elements contained in the FilterGroup to the input parameters provided.
      FastVector getGroupAttributes()
      Returns a FastVector instance containing all the Attribute elements of this FilterGroup, this Attribute elements are the one's each Instace generated with the method createInstanceUsingFilters must have.
      Instances getGroupDataset()
      Returns the current dataset for this FilterGroup.
      String getGroupDatasetName()
      Returns the dataset name for this FilterGroup.

    • Method Detail

      • getGroupDatasetName

        String getGroupDatasetName()
        Returns the dataset name for this FilterGroup.
        Returns:
        the dataset name of this FilterGroup

      • getGroupDataset

        Instances getGroupDataset()
        Returns the current dataset for this FilterGroup.
        Returns:
        the dataset for this FilterGroup

      • getGroupAttributes

        FastVector getGroupAttributes()
        Returns a FastVector instance containing all the Attribute elements of this FilterGroup, this Attribute elements are the one's each Instace generated with the method createInstanceUsingFilters must have.
        Returns:
        a FastVector containing all the attributes of the FilterGroup
        See Also:
        Attribute, FastVector

      • createInstanceUsingFilters

        Instance createInstanceUsingFilters(String r,
                                  String h)
        Generates an Instance object by applying all the TextFilter elements contained in the FilterGroup to the input parameters provided.
        Parameters:
        r - Response text in the argumentation
        h - Hypothesis text in the argumentation
        Returns:
        an Instance with one Attribute for each TextFilter in the FilterGroup
        See Also:
        Instance

      • addFilter

        void addFilter(TextFilter filter)
        Adds a new TextFilter to the FilterGroup.
        Parameters:
        filter - the TextFilter to be added to this FilterGroup
        See Also:
        TextFilter

      • addClassAttribute

        void addClassAttribute(Attribute attr)
        Adds the Attribute that corresponds to the class of this FilterGroup generated Instances
        Parameters:
        attr - the weka Attribute that will be the class of the Instances
